column4: hm, would there be a reason why, or is it normal under linux/gnome for my CPU usage to go right to 100% when i quickly drag a window around? or when i move my mouse quickly it goes up to nearly 50%..? as windows xp didnt  spike  that high im sure.
if i remember right gkrellm has a utility for mounting/unmounting partitions
does that work for samba mounts?
